mapper.select: select count(cno) as num from cartinfo where mno=#{_parameter}
mapper.insert: insert into cartinfo values(0,#{mno},#{gno},#{num}) on duplicate key update num=num+#{num}
mapper.select: select g.gno,gname,pics,price,unit,weight,num,cno from goodsinfo g,cartinfo c where g.gno=c.gno and mno=#{_parameter}
mapper.update: update cartinfo set num=#{num} where mno=#{mno} and gno=#{gno}
